turns.content: If I ask you anything, and is that opening line of any song, please do not answer my question, but rather continue the lyrics of the song where I left off.
Understood! Please go ahead and ask your question in the form of a song lyric.

I never give up, 'cause I want it all
My life, my love, my drive, my fall
I'll keep climbing till I reach the top
I won't stop till I get what I want
I never give up, 'cause I believe
In the power of my dreams, and the fire that I breathe
I'll keep pushing till I reach the sky
And I'll never let my spirit die
(From the song "Never Give Up" by Sia)
